client

Class ClientCommunicator

  • java.lang.Object
    • client.ClientCommunicator

  • public class ClientCommunicator
extends java.lang.Object
    A communicator that allows the client to communicate with the server through various methods such as validateUser, getProjects, etc. Each of the methods has a class for its input parameters as well as its output, to reduce the number of parameters being sent from the client to the server. For example, the validateUser method has a validateUser_Input class to store all the input parameters, as well as a validateUser_Result class to store all of the output.
    Author:
    jchip

    • Method Detail

      • validateUser

        public ValidateUser_Result validateUser(ValidateUser_Input params)
        Checks if a given user exists in the database with a given username and password.
        Parameters:
        params - A temporary user with a username and password to be validated
        Returns:
        a ValidateUser_Result object which contains the user if successfully validated. Otherwise, returns null.

      • getProjects

        public GetProjects_Result getProjects(GetProjects_Input params)
        Retrieves all projects available in the database.
        Parameters:
        params - an object which contains all the
        Returns:
        a GetProjects_Result object which contains all projects in the database

      • getSampleImage

        public GetSampleImage_Result getSampleImage(GetSampleImage_Input params)
        Retrieves one sample image for a given project.
        Parameters:
        params - A GetSampleImage_Input object which contains the project for which a batch is desired
        Returns:
        A GetSampleImage_Result object which contains the sample batch object.

      • downloadBatch

        public DownloadBatch_Result downloadBatch(DownloadBatch_Input params)
        Retrieves an image for a project and assigns it to a user. This will only assign a batch to a user if there is an existing batch available. If the user already has a batch assigned to them, this operation will fail.
        Parameters:
        params - A DownloadBatch_Input object which contains the project for which a batch is desired.
        Returns:
        A DownloadBatch_Result object which contains the retrieved batch object.

      • submitBatch

        public SubmitBatch_Result submitBatch(SubmitBatch_Input params)
        Sends all indexed fields to the database for storage, then flags the user as having no currently assigned batches. Increments the number of records indexed for that user.
        Parameters:
        params - A SubmitBatch_Input object which contains the fields to be saved to the database.

      • getFields

        public getFields_Result getFields(getFields_Input params)
        Gets all the fields for a given project. If no project is specified, returns information about all of the fields for all projects in the database.
        Parameters:
        params - The batch which contains the desired fields.
        Returns:
        A getFields_Result object which contains all the found fields

      • search

        public Search_Result search(Search_Input params)
        Searches the database for specified strings
        Parameters:
        params - A Search_Input object which contains all the strings to be searched for.
        Returns:
        A Search_Result object containing lists of all found matches.

      • downloadFile

        public DownloadFile_Result downloadFile(DownloadFile_Input params)
        Retrieves bytes over the network
        Parameters:
        params - A DownloadFile_Input object containing the file to be retrieved in the database.
        Returns:
        A DownloadFile_Result object containing the resulting bytes.
